page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: {HALL FARM (cont) creamery where it is used to make cheese. The farm employes a total of 17 full time workers. This is made up of:- 1 management 1 management/crop tech: 6 tractor drivers 2 fitters/mechanics 2 builders 1 herdman 1 secretary 2 agricultural students 1 student Y.T.S. The Gittins family first farmed at Hall Farm in 1898 and have continued to this date. {RUYTON XI TOWNS POST OFFICE }is run by Mr and Mrs Lougheed.They sell stamps, post cards,greeting cards,pet food, video tapes, sweets,soft drinks,boot and shoe laces, second hand clothes, cigarettes and tobacco also postal orders and saving stamps.
